      static HumanHand HumanHand.fromMainHand(java.lang.Object mainHand)
      Converts Bukkit's MainHand property to the HumanHand LEFT/RIGHT constants.

      Converts a net.minecraft.server.EnumHand into a HumanHand, keeping in mind whether LEFT/RIGHT is the MAIN or OFF hand.

      Gets the opposite hand (LEFT -> RIGHT, RIGHT->LEFT)

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers with parameters of type HumanHand 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack HumanHand.getHeldItem(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity humanEntity, HumanHand humanHand)
      Gets the item held in a given hand for a human entity.

      On versions before and including MC 1.8.8 this method always returns null for the LEFT hand, and will return the held item for the RIGHT hand.
      static void HumanHand.setHeldItem(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity humanEntity, HumanHand humanHand, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Sets the item held in a given hand for a human entity.

      On versions before and including MC 1.8.8 this method silently fails for the LEFT hand, and will instead set the held item only for the RIGHT hand.
      static java.lang.Object HumanHand.toMainHand(HumanHand hand)
      Converts a HumanHand to Bukkit's MainHand.
      static java.lang.Object HumanHand.toNMSEnumHand(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity humanEntity, HumanHand humanHand)
      Converts a HumanHand into a net.minecraft.server.EnumHand, keeping in mind whether LEFT/RIGHT is the MAIN or OFF hand.
